nodes.text: "Brassie" was the individual name of a Bespin Motors Flurry II combat cloud car
C. 29 BBY, the Flurry II was a brand-new model. Outer Rim Oreworks provided its Security Chief (ORO) of Lamaredd, Mix Liddell, with a shiny, bronze-colored Flurry II that he named "Brassie".
Liddell used "Brassie", one of the few air vehicles of Lamaredd, for aerial patrols, and parked it on the roof of his office. In little time, "Brassie" was battered and no longer shiny.
